name: Sentimata
description:
early prototype.

Program robots, survive and build your base on harsh planet.

Hi im Alex Antonov, solo developer of Sentimata, i am experienced programmer and artist, check my portfolio at https://www.artstation.com/artist/alexantonov

Im working on this project in free time, and i hope you'll love it as much as i do.

==========================================================

Press F1 for help

Some instructions : hook up wheel to controller, and connect a float input to it, then turn the controller on, to make the car move, right and left wheels rotate in different directions so one side has to have negative float. Make float value for wheel around 5000 for it to move, ill remap it later.
